title: The square
preview_text:
The king cannot move and that is his power. one square. crippled. the whole war is for him and he does almost nothing
Stillness is the darkest form of dominion. not peace, not rest, not meditation,

title: What the Fuck is Taste
preview_text:
In college I took a class on what it means to be human. We spent weeks eliminating the obvious answers: intelligence, tool use, language. Now AI is working on all three.

title: Why Great Philosophers Hated Women?
preview_text:
For women, hate is a moral compass. It's an out-of-sight, out of mind case.
 
"A woman is a deformed male"
"Truth is alien to woman"
"Women are more barbaric than men"
All great philosophers, at least
